page.title: 09Recreation Flintham.
page.content: Basically home made. Only the irregular Flintham Festivals involve the whole village. The pub,{The Boot & {Shoe}has harvest suppers, christmas lunches and regular outings for the retired. These may stop after January 1986 when the present tennants retire. Regular{wine tastings}are held in the Old School and are very popular, food was recently introduced to 'soak up' the effects of the wine! Over the last few years Flintham and Syerston have competed against one another at bowls and in quizzes. A{Library van}calls once a fortnight with a good stock of books for both adults and children, who also have their own library van in the school summer holidays. Most house holds have a television, many have videos and hi-fi systems.
